Actions.Name: Add recipient
Actions.Description: Add a recipient into existing workflow

Actions.Name: Apply template
Actions.Description: Apply a provided template on the document workflow

Actions.Name: Approve a document
Actions.Description: Recipient can approve the workflow on this turn

Actions.Name: Complete the workflow (Terminate in the middle)
Actions.Description: Workflow owner can complete workflow at any stage to terminate it

Actions.Name: Create a workflow
Actions.Description: Create a new workflow inside the SigningHub

Actions.Name: Decline a document
Actions.Description: Recipient can decline the workflow on his turn

Actions.Name: Delete recipient from a workflow
Actions.Description: Delete a particular recipient from an existing workflow

Actions.Name: Delete a workflow
Actions.Description: Delete existing workflow by the workflow owner

Actions.Name: Download a particular document from a workflow
Actions.Description: Download a particular document from an existing workflow

Actions.Name: Download all documents of a workflow
Actions.Description: Download all the documents in extracted/zipped format of an existing workflow from SigningHub

Actions.Name: Get contects
Actions.Description: Get a list of contacts related to the logged-in user from SigningHub

Actions.Name: Get recipients
Actions.Description: Get a list of recipients of an existing workflow

Actions.Name: Get templates
Actions.Description: Get a list of all enterprise templates from SigningHub

Actions.Name: Get workflows
Actions.Description: Get a list of workflows from SigningHub for the Logged-in user

Actions.Name: Share a document workflow
Actions.Description: Share a document workflow to the recipient

Actions.Name: Upload a document into workflow
Actions.Description: Upload a document into existing workflow
